template.name: rmseed
template.value: seedDb(connString, __dirname + '/seed/statements/$statementName$.sql')$END$
template.description: Quick seed template

template.name: rmhandler
template.description: Live template of handler

template.name: mocksetupsuccess
template.value: $unit$.withArgs($args$).yields(null, $succesObj$);
template.description: Setting up of mock in the before part of a handler test

template.name: mocksetuperr
template.value: $unit$.withArgs($args$).yields(error('unknown'), null);
template.description: Setting up of mock in the before part of a handler test, error

template.name: rmdbcobject
template.value: dbc.requireWithMessage(dbc.isObject($obj$) && !_.isEmpty($obj$), '$obj$ object must be specified');
template.description: Adds dbc condition line for object

template.name: rmdbccallback
template.value: dbc.requireWithMessage(dbc.isFunction(cb), 'callback function must be specified');
template.description: Adds in dbc condition for checking if callback function is specified

template.name: rmdbcarray
template.value: dbc.requireWithMessage(dbc.isArray($arr$) && !_.isEmpty($arr$), '$arr$ is not a valid array');
template.description: Adds in dbc check for arrays

template.name: rmdbcargs
template.value: dbc.requireWithMessage(arguments.length === $args$, 'function called with incorrect number of arguments');
template.description: Addds in dbc check for correct number of arguments

template.name: rmdbcnumber
template.value: dbc.requireWithMessage(dbc.isNumber(Number($num$)) && Number($num$) > $min$, '$num$ is not a valid number');
template.description: Template for dbc require for a number

template.name: rmdbcstring
template.value: dbc.requireWithMessage(dbc.isString($string$) && $string$.length > 0, '$string$ is not a valid string');
template.description: dbc require for a string
